mng: divinatory diagram, one of the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], one of the sixty-four divinatory hexagrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]

exm.mng: the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], gossip, gossipy
to divine using the trigrams, fortune telling
to change one's mind, to go back on one's word
the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (I Ching or Yi Jing) 易經|易经
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
